message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with markerless motion capture using a single depth camera. 
2. cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the paper proposes a fast data-driven parametric body model based on linear-blend skinning to decouple deformations due to pose, anthropometrics, and body shape. 
3. cs.RO (Robotics) is another possible category as the paper incorporates physics-based dynamic priors to estimate pose and shape parameters using torque trajectories and predictions of active contact points. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) is a possible category as the paper deals with motion capture and produces better qualitative results, reducing visual artifacts like foot-skate and jitter. 
5. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible category as the paper proposes a data-driven approach to motion capture using robust ICP optimization with physics-based dynamic priors.
